ISSUE.TITLE: Admin Dashboard > Latest Orders > View Order results in Page Not Found?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: v4.20-beta Steps to reproduce the problem: - clean install (including sample data) - login and navigate to admin area - click one of the "view" buttons in the Latest Orders widget on the Admin Dashboard http://localhost:15536/Edit/5 Page not found The page you requested was not found, and we have a fine guess why. If you typed the URL directly, please make sure the spelling is correct. The page no longer exists. In this case, we profusely apologize for the inconvenience and for any damage this may cause. Message in log: Log level Error Short message Error 404. The requested page (/Edit/5) was not found Full message IP address 127.0.0.1 Customer rutger.buijzen@dotcontrol.com Page URL http://localhost:15536/page-not-found Referrer URL http://localhost:15536/ Created on 5/3/2019 10:33:28 AM

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5 from nopSolutions/develop merge upstream
